title: Game breaking bug/hack.
body:
I just played a game a couple of minutes ago as adc, and our support morg who had been trolling the entire game randomly got a penta kill. I wasn't watching, but shortly after she got a quadra with what appeared to be multiple botrk active affects. As someone who takes ranked rather seriously this kind of frustrated me, because even though it was advantageous to me it is still cheating. I am unsure if anybody else has posted about it, so I apologise if others have. Please investigate this player.

Edit: Just checked this player match history, which is complete wins in ranked. This needs to be patched asap.

replies.body:
Sorry we've been more radio silent on this than usual. When these things happen, we try to limit the amount of exposure that exploits get until after we've fixed them. This sometimes means remaining silent. We've had a team working to patch this exploit, which is beginning to roll out as we speak. In the meantime, members of our Player Support team & Gamer Security Unit have been banning players using this exploit, and are going to continue to do so until this has been fully resolved.

This kind of [crap happens](http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=2088065&highlight=tamat) from time to time, and when it does, we drop what we're doing to address the issue. It's serious business, and we don't take it lightly. I assure you that the banhammer will be swift, and there shall be no hiding for those that took advantage of this.

Since my original post was deleted...

That exploit is insane. Yeah, the accounts using it will very likely be banned...eventually. I've spectated (and reported via a support ticket) somebody who's risen from ~low silver to mid plat already w/ 100% win rate despite going 0/10 the first 15+ min of the game. There's a few game-breaking issues with the current approach of finding and banning people after the fact:

1) The damage is already done. People's MMR and rankings have already been affected. How will this be addressed?
2) The damage is furthered because it creates a horrible atmosphere being unable to win despite being far stronger and skilled due completely to one player that absolutely can't be touched. It's no longer a team game in a match with somebody using this exploit.
3) What is going to happen with people who queued with abusers? They're just as guilty. Otherwise, why not take a smurf account and just carry them to plat/diamond/master before having the abusing account banned?
4) What about ranked teams? Should the whole team be banned as well?

Overall, there is a known issue that completely breaks the fundamental goal of the game and the response so far of addressing it via bans later (and hiding discussions about the bug) isn't a good option.

Thoughts?
How are you going to heal the damage that has already been done, ive lost promos because of these people and i dont think that is fair.

IP bans aren't effective. There are plenty of apps that use VPN tunnels and proxies. WTFast is a well known one that works to find optimized connections to LoL servers. Also, there's a good likelihood of blocking entire college campuses, large apartment buildings, hotels, etc. with IP bans.

Yes people playing in hotels, using a schools floor IP etc would suffer greatly which is why I just think riot should ban accounts, if people want to level from 30 again go for it, incarnation was given the chance to do so and whether or not he did DDOS that was what he was accused of when he was banned in the first place, getting free wins by DDOSing/exploiting/hacking is all the same result wise. So in the end riot should let these people play again, just Perma ban any account that has benefited through exploiting or duoing with one who is. Also an idea would be to hire a few game testers to find these bugs, devoted game testers like what most multi gaming companies do for pre alphas.

An IP ban is a bother and games with swift ban hammers for example Halo 3 back in the day who had strict rules and strong hammers didn't have constant complaints put in about people cheating,being overly toxic, or otherwise. Riot is incredibly kind to its community and I love them for that and the game they made but a lot of people in the community do not deserve to play the game..They ruin the fun of climbing ladders or even the simplicity of enjoying a normal blind pick game. So again IP bans as much as they can screw over people they also solve a lot of problems.
